Title: Contact
Contact_Para1: If you need to contact the project directly, send an e-mail to $1{flashpoint (at) bluemaxima (dot) org}.
Contact_Para2: Flashpoint does not offer services for making Flash-enabled content available in the browser after 2020. Please refer to projects such as $1{Ruffle} instead.
Contact_Para3: Archival requests should not be done via email; $1{follow this guide} instead. Troubleshooting emails are accepted, but please read the $2{FAQ} first.
